package.name: alt-codes
package.author: TLZ
package.description: Use Windows Alt codes with Espanso.
package.title: Alt Codes

manifest.author: TLZ
manifest.description: Use Windows Alt codes with Espanso.
manifest.name: alt-codes
manifest.title: Alt Codes

packageYml.name: package.yml
packageYml.content:
